member.name: NL_NETWORK_CONNECTIVITY_COST_HINT
member.summary: Defines constants that specify hints about the usage charge for a network connection.

member.name: NL_NETWORK_CONNECTIVITY_COST_HINT.NetworkConnectivityCostHintUnknown
member.summary: Specifies a hint that cost information is not available.

member.name: NL_NETWORK_CONNECTIVITY_COST_HINT.NetworkConnectivityCostHintUnrestricted
member.summary: Specifies a hint that the connection is unlimited, and has unrestricted usage charges and capacity constraints.

member.name: NL_NETWORK_CONNECTIVITY_COST_HINT.NetworkConnectivityCostHintFixed
member.summary: Specifies a hint that the use of the connection is unrestricted up to a specific limit.

member.name: NL_NETWORK_CONNECTIVITY_COST_HINT.NetworkConnectivityCostHintVariable
member.summary: Specifies a hint that the connection is charged on a per-byte basis.
